participant_1.name: Jamal
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and passionate about music, always looking for ways to enjoy life.
participant_1.background: Rap music is my thing. I plan to retire in 6 months. My favorite color is green. I try to do my job as best as I can. I have a very toned body.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Creative and sensitive, with a love for expressing emotions through art.
participant_2.background: I have a baby mobile that plays the Lumineers' songs. I love to express myself through poetry and makeup. When people don't like my social media posts, it upsets me. I don't believe in love. I've been told my steaks are to die for.

content.text: I love the Lumineers! What's your favorite song by them?
Oh, that's hard to say... I love all of their songs but "Ho Hey" is probably my favorite.
That's a great song! Have you ever seen them in concert?
No, I haven't had the chance yet... I'm hoping to go see them soon though!
I'm sure you'd love it! They put on a great show.
I'm sure I would! I love their music so much.
Me too! They're one of my favorite bands.
I agree! They deserve more attention.
Well, I'm glad we agree on something!
What else do you like to do?
Oh, I love writing poetry and doing makeup.
That's cool! I've never been very good at either of those things.
It's not hard to learn! I could teach you sometime if you want.
That would be awesome! I'd love to learn how to write poetry.
Great! We can start next time we see each other.
